description: This is a Java class representing a data transfer object (DTO) for a fund transfer, encapsulating details such as account numbers, amount, transaction reference, and status, and extending an audit class.

classes.name: FundTransfer
classes.description: A DTO class for handling fund transfer data, including transfer details and audit information.
